install.name: sh404sef - Similar urls plugin
install.author: Yannick Gaultier
install.description: Search for urls similar to that of the current page

param.name: max_number_of_urls
param.label: Max number of urls displayed
param.description: How many urls should be included in the list, at most

param.name: min_segment_length
param.label: Min url segment to use
param.description: Minimum number of character of an url segment to include in the search

param.name: include_pdf
param.label: Include pdf links
param.description: If set to Yes, links to pdf version of pages may be included in similar urls displayed

param.name: include_print
param.label: Include print links
param.description: If set to Yes, links to printable version of pages may be included in similar urls displayed
